yacl3.config.tsunderify:config.suffixCha: The chance for a suffix to be added to the end of a message, set to 0 to disable.
yacl3.config.tsunderify:config.stutterCh: The chance for stutter to be added to the start of a message, set to 0 to disable.
yacl3.config.tsunderify:config.tsunifyOn:
If enabled, messages you send using the enter key will be tsunderified.
